name: cyberpunk_200s.sys
description:
Made under 72 hours during Ludum Dare 46 (Theme: Keep it alive)

Created by @Epicload and @Hexcolyte

Description

You are a low budget tower building hacker. The evil cyber ninjas try to attack your core. You have only one job! Can you keep the core alive for 200 seconds?

Gameplay

  1. Build tower to defense the core
  2. Kill enemy to build more towers
  3. Protect the core

Control

  • Player Movement - WASD
  • Place tower - Left-mouse click

Tips

  •  You can only build the tower on the blue space
  •  You need to get close enough to build
  • Each tower cost money, beware of unnecessary spending especially in early stage

Tool

  • Unity
  • Aseprite
  • Audacity

Credit
